data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Perm'.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Perm‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Perm', let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 193 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Perm‘, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Perm' that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Perm' to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Yakut people might believe through him.
Father, help the 41,261 believers in Perm' to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Perm‘, Russia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Perm' to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Perm'
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Uzbeki, Andalal, Abaza, Akkin, Aghul
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Uzbeki (9,800), Andalal (62,000), Abaza (45,000), Akkin (104,000), Aghul (35,000)
